page.title: 05Aberford Village Hall
page.content: Before the village hall was built it was Ned Lawn's wheelright shop.The village hall was built by the Gascoignes who gave it to the villagers who had to look after it because the Gascoignes left no money for its upkeep.Cynthia Gascoigne opened it in1923 in memory of her grandfather,Col. Gascoigne.Trustees make rules but the management committee runs the hall and raises funds.{Chairman-}Mr.Howson, {Secretary -}Mrs.Whitehead,{Treasurer}- Mrs.Trayford.{Committee} -Mrs.Howson,Mr.Baxter,Mr.Graham,Mr.and Mrs.Nicholson,Mrs.Cowie and Mr.Watson. {Uses}-The village hall is used regularly by the youth club,Tuesday club(senior citizens) and badminton club and on othe days for discos,parties,weddings etc.Graffiti, vandalism and finance are a problem.
